name: ReportScopeValue

methods.name: getAllowsDivision
methods.description: Returns a boolean value that indicates whether you can segment the report by this scope.

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Returns the display name of the scope of the report.

methods.name: getValue
methods.description: Returns the scope value for the report.

description: Contains information about a possible scope value. Scope values depend on the report type. For example, you can set the scope for opportunity reports to All opportunities, My teamâ€™s opportunities, or My opportunities.
